alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 25 at 8:35PM MDT until June 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 108 expected. For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 111 expected. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. For the Excessive Heat Warning, from Noon to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat events.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
